com.gocardless.errors

Class GoCardlessApiException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.gocardless.GoCardlessException
            • com.gocardless.errors.GoCardlessApiException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GoCardlessInternalException, InvalidApiUsageException, InvalidStateException, ValidationFailedException

    public class GoCardlessApiException
extends GoCardlessException

    Base class for exceptions that are thrown as a result of error responses from the API.

    See Also:
